body:
In the last few months, the Global team planned out a whole new update for the server. Unlike most updates, this will not widely change the server but instead, make the server easier to market and advertise to newer players. We will be bringing new game modes to the server and celebrate the old. Here is how the servers are going to be formatted:

NEW Capture (Capture the Wool)
[CTW] Apollo 13
[CTW] Cake
[CTW] Golden Drought III
[CTW] Antaran
[CTW] Green’s Farms
[CTW] Madness
[CTW] Apache
[CTW] Deadlock
[CTW] Ender Hill
[CTW] Revolution
[CTW] Haunted Hallows CTW

NEW Walls
[Walls] Garden
[Walls] Mt. Blizzard
[Walls] Lands
[Walls] Hawaii
[Walls] Mini Walls
[Walls] Village

Destroy (Destroy the Monument & Destroy the Core)
[MIX] Kollad
[MIX] Nevran Remastered
[MIX] Sunbeam Temple Remastered
[DTC] E Minor
[DTM] Galloway
[DTM] Starshine Beach
[DTM] Halcyon I
[DTM] Dust Devils
[DTM] Rendezvous Redux
[DTM] Sandstorm

Conquest (Team Deathmatch & King of the Hill)
[KoTH] Green Hill Zone
[KoTH] Overgrown
[KoTH] City Scape
[KoTH] U-Bahn
[TDM] Downtown
[TDM] SuperPRISM
[TDM] Actrix 2
[TDM] Rapture
[TDM] Ancient Lake
[TDM] Illegal Office

We will also be keeping a very close eye on feedback for these rotations. Here are the threads for the different servers:

Server Capture - https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/c3b677672 
Server Walls - https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/b9d52ca63 
Server Destroy - https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/e9ac2fb88 

We also have a new lobby so check that out!

We would like to thank everyone in the Global team for their hard work on this update.

replies.body:
The global team is made up of the heads of the staff team - so Sr staff, head map devs, head of social media, and head official, as well as the developers. 

It's basically a team that allows us all to get things done in regards to the server's direction.
